<letter id='abl393'>
<recipient first='Edwin' last='Stanton' type='individual'/>
<p><i>[Note to Secretary Stanton.] <a href='/results.php?city=washington' rel='city origin'>Washington</a>. November 11, <a href="/results.php?year=1863">1863</a></i></p>

<p>Dear Sir, I personally wish Jacob Freese, of New Jersey, to be appointed Colonel of a coloured regiment, and this regardless of whether he can tell the exact shade of Julius Ceasar's hair.</p>

<p>[<a href="/results.php?tla=abl" rel="me">A. LINCOLN</a>]</p></letter>
